title: $NDLS Noodles & Company Q4 2024 Earnings Conference Call

24 and q1 2025 to date sales Trends

ranch this dish has a taste of food

mac and cheese than the dish it replaced
this is part of a whole new Mac and
Cheese lineup that we will be rolling
out in

kavat tapi which is a fresh new take on

and topped it with fresh

awareness our new menu does a much

noodles during the teas phase of our new
